name: nimmneun/onesheet
description: OneSheet is a fast and lightweight single/multi sheet excel/xlsx file writer for PHP 5.4+ (until v1.2.6), PHP 7 & PHP 8 with styling and cell auto-sizing support.
_comment: min required version to run unit tests PHP7.3, bcs PHPUnit < 9 is incompatible with PHP8

suggest.ext-gd: Required for accurate cell-auto sizing only.
